content: introducing the fall fable pullover a cozy long-sleeved v-neck design that perfectly captures the essence of autumn this pullover features a striking striped pattern and beautiful textured stitches that add depth and charm to your outfit a video tutorial is included to help guide you along the way in creating this wardrobe staple the free crochet pattern in sizes xs-5x is available on my blog 1 the lion brand kit comes 2 with all the yarn needed to make your sweater plus a free copy of the ad-free printable pdf pattern download you can also customize your yarn colors a full video tutorial is available on my youtube channel 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-fall-fable-pullover-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/4pi5q 3 https //youtu be/_k81dw2vsbw
